text:
@SecPompeo Coronavirus traces found in March 2019 sewage sample, Spanish study shows Spanish virologists have found traces of the novel coronavirus in a sample of Barcelona waste water collected in March 2019, nine months before China.But US with its huge Numbers！！
https://t.co/tYOwUEfucx
